          <title>
            <string language="en">Stomach acidity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magensäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acidité d'estomac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acidity do estômago</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acidità dello stomaco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οξύτητα στομαχιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acidez del estómago</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the acidity level of the stomach maintained by some glands that produce hydrochloric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">defence against micro-organisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">micro-organisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stomach</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Säurestufe des Magens,
der durch einige Drüsen beibehalten wird, die Salzsäure produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre le niveau d'acidité de 
l'estomac mis à jour par quelques glandes qui produisent l'acide 
chlorhydrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra o nível do acidity do 
estômago mantido por algumas glândulas que produzem o ácido 
hydrochloric.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra il livello di acidità dello
stomaco effettuato da alcune ghiandole che producono l'acido 
cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει επίπεδο οξύτητας του 
στομαχιού που διατηρείται από μερικούς αδένες που παράγουν το 
υδροχλωρικό οξύ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra el nivel de la acidez del 
estómago mantenido por algunas glándulas que produzcan el ácido 
hidroclórico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verteidigung gegen Mikroorganismen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salzsäure</string>
